Post_Title: How do we get in contact with Anonymous? I think it is time for the hacker to provide the abortion history of every single politician and judge’s family and former partners. 75 years of medical history, thousands of abortions.

Threads.Reply_Text: holy fuck can y’all shut the fuck up this is embarrassing

Replies.Reply_Text: I was being facetious about Anonymous. But are you seriously suggesting we should all just shrug our shoulders and let our right to privacy which informs Legal protection for abortion, gay marriage, interracial marriage, etc. be stripped away

you’re putting words into my mouth

my point was saying “let’s put out the batsignal and call on anonymous!” was just cringe

Haha. Okay. That’s fair. I was saying it like “ Who you gonna call… Ghostbusters”

Still it is cringe for a few reason. Earned.
